data.title: 3 TMC, 2 Congress MLAs accompany Mukul Roy to Delhi, likely to join BJP today
data.description: Three Trinamool Congress, a CPI (M) and two Congress MLAs are likely to join the BJP today. The TMC MLAs left for Delhi with BJP leader Mukul Roy on Monday.

data.title: Baby boy 'Narendra Modi' renamed as Mohammad Altaf Modi, mother claims community pressure
data.description: Mainaz Begum in UP's Wazirganj had stated that the child was born on 23 May, the day PM Modi won a second term, so she had named her child as Narendra Damodardas Modi. - Latest India News from Opindia.com
